articles.title: Moderna says FDA delayed RSV vaccine approval to end of May - CNBC
articles.description: The FDA has not informed Moderna of any issues related to the vaccine's safety, efficacy or quality that would prevent its approval, the biotech company said.
articles.content:
Moderna on Friday said the Food and Drug Administration has delayed the approval of its vaccine for respiratory syncytial virus to the end of May due to "administrative constraints" at the agency.
